Quirks.definition: Unusual or idiosyncratic behaviors, habits, or characteristics that are distinctive to an individual.

quirks.name: Memento
quirks.description: Carries a vial of sand from every beach they've visited, labeling each one with the location and date.

quirks.name: Communicative
quirks.description: Talks to animals as if they can understand.

quirks.name: Collector
quirks.description: Collects interesting rocks and pebbles from their travels, assigning each one a unique meaning or memory.

quirks.name: Seasoning
quirks.description: Always carries a small pouch of assorted spices and seasonings, adding them to meals regardless of the cuisine.

quirks.name: Botanist
quirks.description: Keeps a collection of pressed flowers from significant moments in their life, carefully organizing them in a journal.

quirks.name: Doodler
quirks.description: Has a habit of doodling intricate designs whenever they're deep in thought or listening intently.

quirks.name: Astronomer
quirks.description: Carries a small telescope or binoculars everywhere they go, always ready to stargaze or birdwatch.

quirks.name: Quotidian
quirks.description: Keeps a list of favorite quotes or passages from books, movies, and speeches, referring to them for inspiration.

quirks.name: Chronicler
quirks.description: Writes letters to themselves and seals them in envelopes, to be opened on specific future dates as a form of reflection.

quirks.name: Illustrator
quirks.description: Carries a pocket-sized sketchbook and pencils, capturing scenes and moments from their daily life through drawings.
